items.title: 7-Zip
items.content_html: Version 24.09 published on 2024-11-29. The summary of changes are: Latest stable release with updates, improvements, and fixes for better performance on multiple platforms.

items.title: awscli2
items.content_html: Version 2.24.10 published on latest-release. The summary of changes are: Includes support for the Bedrock Knowledge Base Web Connector user-agent parameter, updates Python interpreter to 3.12.9, and enhances AppStream 2.0 with Certificate-Based Authentication in multi-session fleets.

items.title: azurecli
items.content_html: Version 2.69.0 published on 2023-02-11. The summary of changes are: The latest update includes bug fixes and improvements enhancing the stability and performance of Azure CLI.

items.title: bicepcli
items.content_html: Version v0.33.93 published on 2025-01-29. The summary of changes are: Addressed v0.33.13 language server crash and deployment failures in looped resources, made the Deployment Pane a stable feature, and introduced additional bug fixes for improved functionality.

items.title: bruno
items.content_html: Version v1.39.1 published on 2025-02-20. The summary of changes are: Improved worker thread reuse for bru file parsing and enhanced feature request and bug report templates with additional detail capture.

items.title: clink
items.content_html: Version v1.7.10 published on 2023-02-07. The summary of changes are: Added new Lua API unicode.char(), a diagnostic command, and fixed a crash issue related to console window width.

items.title: dbeaver
items.content_html: Version 24.3.5 published on 2025-02-16. The summary of changes are: The latest release includes various bug fixes and improvements, enhancing stability and performance. It remains free and open source, supporting a wide array of databases. This version ensures compatibility with modern platforms and introduces incremental updates.

items.title: dive
items.content_html: Version v0.12.0 published on 2024-02-02. The summary of changes are: The latest release includes support for Docker 25+ compatibility and adds docker layer-wise vulnerability scanning. Several bugs were fixed, including issues with fetching local images, and additional updates were made to streamline installation and improve compatibility.

items.title: docker-desktop
items.content_html: Version 4.38.0 published on 2025-01-30. The summary of changes are: Introduced features such as multi-node Kubernetes clusters and independent updates for Docker Compose and other components. Upgrades include Docker Engine v27.5.1 and Kubernetes v1.31.4. Fixed various issues across platforms, including token refresh bugs and Docker API container creation errors.

items.title: Buiild Apps SDK
items.content_html: Version 6.0.428 published on 2024-11-12. The summary of changes are: The latest release of the SDK includes updates for building .NET applications, supported by Visual Studio 2022 version 17.3. It contains runtime enhancements with .NET Runtime, ASP.NET Core Runtime, and .NET Desktop Runtime in version 6.0.36. This is the final supported update before moving to newer versions like .NET 9.0.

items.title: Build Apps SDK
items.content_html: Version 8.0.406 published on 2025-02-11. The summary of changes are: The latest .NET 8.0 SDK release (v8.0.406) includes improvements and bug fixes, ensuring enhanced developer experience and performance. It is fully compatible with new runtimes and supports the latest features of C# 12, F# 8, and Visual Basic 16.9.

items.title: drawio
items.content_html: Version 26.0.15 published on 2025-02-21. The summary of changes are: The latest release includes updates to the draw.io core and now utilizes Electron 34.2.0. All changes from versions 26.0.10 to 26.0.15 are integrated into this build.

items.title: etlp2pcapng
items.content_html: Version v1.11.0 published on 2023-06-08. The summary of changes are: Improved handling of pktmon captures for better functionality.

items.title: ffmpeg
items.content_html: Version 7.1 published on 2024-09-30. The summary of changes are: FFmpeg 7.1 'PÃ©ter' includes updates from the 7.1 release branch, with improved functionality and the latest library versions for enhanced media processing.

items.title: gateway
items.content_html: Version 2024.3.3 published on 2025-02-13. The summary of changes are: The Gateway 2024.3.3 is out with minor updates.

items.title: git-win
items.content_html: Version 2.48.1.windows.1 published on 2025-02-13. The summary of changes are: This release is the last to feature 32-bit installer support while addressing maintenance challenges. Key updates include Git v2.48.1, default Windows-native HTTPS backend, and fixes for credential helper errors and .gitignore warnings.

items.title: cli
items.content_html: Version v1.53.0 published on 2025-02-14. The summary of changes are: The latest release documents the GLAB_CHECK_UPDATE environment variable, adds features like --raw option for diffs, update checks, and improves CI and repo-related commands.

items.title: gitlab release cli
items.content_html: Version v0.22.0 published on 2025-02-17T10:50:07Z. The summary of changes are: This release merges branch 'release-0-22-0' into 'master' to provide the latest improvements and stability fixes.

items.title: gitlab-runner-agent
items.content_html: Version v17.9.0 published on 2025-02-20T03:20:06Z. The summary of changes are: Updates include changes documented in the changelog with minor improvements and fixes.

items.title: golang
items.content_html: Version 1.24.0 published on Unknown. The summary of changes are: The latest stable release includes security patches and updates for enhanced performance and compatibility across multiple platforms.

items.title: golang1.21
items.content_html: Version 1.21.13 published on 2024-08-06. The summary of changes are: Includes fixes to the go command, the covdata command, and the bytes package.

items.title: golang1.22
items.content_html: Version 1.22.12 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: Go 1.22.12 includes security fixes to the crypto/elliptic package as well as bug fixes to the compiler and the go command.

items.title: golang1.23
items.content_html: Version 1.23.6 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: Includes security fixes to the crypto/elliptic package and bug fixes to the compiler and the go command.

items.title: helm
items.content_html: Version 3.17.1 published on 2025-02-12. The summary of changes are: Helm v3.17.1 is a patch release that fixes various minor issues and encourages users to upgrade for an improved experience.

items.title: inkscape
items.content_html: Version 1.4 published on 2024-10-13. The summary of changes are: Inkscape 1.4 introduces features like the Filter Gallery, modular grids, improved font preview, customizable handles, and support for Affinity Designer file import. It also includes faster extensions, new templates, and over 500 new icons in the Dash theme. Numerous bug fixes and enhancements further improve the user experience.

items.title: IntelliJ IDEA
items.content_html: Version 2024.3.3 published on 2025-02-12. The summary of changes are: The update improves Maven project syncing, enhances screen reader detection on Windows startup, and fixes custom toolbar icon issues after IDE restarts.

items.title: jmeter
items.content_html: Version 5.6.3 published on 2024-01-07. The summary of changes are: Stable release including all updates and fixes from prior release candidates.

items.title: jq
items.content_html: Version 1.7.1 published on 2023-12-13. The summary of changes are: Fixes important security vulnerabilities, enhances compatibility for bright backgrounds, and includes various language, CLI improvements, and bug fixes.

items.title: kubectl
items.content_html: Version 1.32.2 published on 2025-02-11. The summary of changes are: This release includes critical patches and updates for stability and security improvements.

items.title: make-win
items.content_html: Version 3.81 published on 2006-11-25. The summary of changes are: This release improves Make's ability to automatically determine the proper order for updating files, reduces recompilation by focusing on changed files, and supports handling a variety of non-source files via makefiles.

items.title: maven
items.content_html: Version 3.9.9 published on 2025-02-22. The summary of changes are: Apache Maven 3.9.9 includes the latest features and bug fixes. It is the recommended version for all users. This release ensures better compatibility and improved performance.

items.title: miniconda
items.content_html: Version 25.1.1-2 published on 2025-02-11. The summary of changes are: Updated version of conda-anaconda-tos to 0.1.2 and includes bug fixes to enhance overall stability.

items.title: node
items.content_html: Version 18.20.7 published on 2025-02-20. The summary of changes are: The latest stable release, Hydrogen, introduces updates to ensure long-term support and bug fixes for production environments.

items.title: node16
items.content_html: Version 16.20.2 published on 2023-08-08. The summary of changes are: This release includes updates and bug fixes, ensuring better performance and stability. It continues to uphold the promise of long-term support in the Gallium release line.

items.title: node18
items.content_html: Version 18.20.7 published on 2025-02-20. The summary of changes are: The latest stable Node.js Hydrogen release includes updates and fixes enhancing stability and performance for long-term use.

items.title: node20
items.content_html: Version 20.18.3 published on 2025-02-10. The summary of changes are: Includes latest stable updates and enhancements for Node.js 20. This version ensures higher stability and improved developer experience.

items.title: node22
items.content_html: Version v22.14.0 published on 2025-02-11. The summary of changes are: Latest stable release with improvements and bug fixes for better performance and reliability.

items.title: notepad-plus-plus
items.content_html: Version 8.7.7 published on 2025-02-07. The summary of changes are: This release resolves a regression in v8.7.6 related to SCN_MODIFIED notification events with certain plugins and introduces the NPPM_ADDSCNMODIFIEDFLAGS API.

items.title: openshift
items.content_html: Version 4.17.0-okd-scos.0 published on 2024-12-16. The summary of changes are: This release includes updates from the okd-scos repository, with preconfigured client tools and installation binaries. Refer to upgrade notes for OKD 4.15 clusters and utilize gpg or shasum for archive verification.

items.title: oraclejdk11
items.content_html: Version 11.0.26 published on 2025-01-21. The summary of changes are: The latest JDK 11.0.26 introduces IANA time zone data 2024b updates, thread and timestamp debugging options, and fixes multiple security vulnerabilities, along with improvements in internationalization and platform-specific functionalities.

items.title: oraclejdk17
items.content_html: Version 17.0.14 published on 2025-01-21. The summary of changes are: Includes IANA timezone data 2024b updates, fixes for security vulnerabilities, and various bug resolutions to enhance stability.

items.title: oraclejdk21
items.content_html: Version 21.0.6 published on 2025-01-21. The summary of changes are: JDK 21.0.6 includes IANA time zone data 2024b, fixes numerous bugs across various components, and addresses security vulnerabilities as outlined in the January 2025 Critical Patch Update.

items.title: oraclejdk8
items.content_html: Version 8u441 published on not provided. The summary of changes are: The latest stable release of JDK 8 focuses on performance improvements and includes critical updates for enhanced security.

items.title: powershell
items.content_html: Version 7.5.0 published on 2023-01-23. The summary of changes are: The latest stable release includes updates to the .NET SDK, improved release pipelines, and enhancements to Help resources. Key improvements focus on build optimizations and tool package updates for better performance.

items.title: putty
items.content_html: Version 0.83 published on 2025-02-08. The summary of changes are: PuTTY 0.83 is a stable release that includes updates and fixes to enhance stability and improve performance for various utilities. This version ensures compatibility across architectures and improves the overall user experience with minor enhancements.

items.title: python
items.content_html: Version 3.13.2 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: Python 3.13.2 includes critical bug fixes and performance improvements, ensuring stability and better runtime efficiency for developers.

items.title: python3.10
items.content_html: Version 3.10.16 published on 2024-12-03. The summary of changes are: This version includes critical security updates and bug fixes to ensure stability and safety for Python 3.10 users.

items.title: python3.11
items.content_html: Version 3.11.11 published on 2024-12-03. The summary of changes are: The latest stable release includes bug fixes and performance improvements for enhanced user experience.

items.title: python3.12
items.content_html: Version 3.12.9 published on 2025-02-04. The summary of changes are: This release includes various bug fixes and stability improvements for enhanced performance and reliability.

items.title: python3.9
items.content_html: Version 3.9.21 published on 2024-12-03. The summary of changes are: Security fixes and updates for Python 3.9. This release includes critical patches to enhance stability and reduce vulnerabilities for users.

items.title: rider
items.content_html: Version 2024.3.5 published on 2025-02-07. The summary of changes are: Rider 2024.3.5 restores the Go to Class feature, introduces improved AI-powered C# cloud completion with proprietary Jet models, and adds support for Anthropic's latest Claude models in AI Assistant for enhanced .NET project development.

items.title: screentogif
items.content_html: Version 2.41.1 published on 2024-09-08. The summary of changes are: Updated Chinese, Turkish, Arabic, and Dutch localizations. Fixed issues with Move Left/Right commands and a typo in the stop recording message.

items.title: task
items.content_html: Version v3.41.0 published on 2025-01-18. The summary of changes are: Fixed dynamic variables logging in verbose mode, added TASK_DIR variable, and addressed multiple critical bugs including concurrent map writes.

items.title: terraform
items.content_html: Version v1.10.0 published on N/A. The summary of changes are: Latest stable version filters medium Fixed bugs retiwned

items.title: vscode
items.content_html: Version 1.97.2 published on 2025-02-13. The summary of changes are: This update fixes various issues to improve stability and reliability. For detailed release notes, visit Updates on the official Visual Studio Code website.

items.title: windows-terminal
items.content_html: Version 1.22.10352.0 published on 2023-02-06. The summary of changes are: Windows Terminal 1.22 introduces a rewritten console hosting implementation with enhanced performance, support for Sixels and Grapheme Clusters, and new UI pop-ups for improved interaction. It also includes features like regex search and snippets for productivity.

items.title: winmerge
items.content_html: Version 2.16.46 published on 2025-01-27. The summary of changes are: This is the latest stable release of WinMerge. Key fixes include resolving issues with ALT-F4 behavior, improvements to folder comparisons and plugins, and translation updates. It is recommended for replacing earlier stable versions.

items.title: wireshark
items.content_html: Version 4.4.4 published on unknown. The summary of changes are: The current stable release of Wireshark supersedes all previous releases, offering the latest enhancements and fixes for network packet analysis.

items.title: yq
items.content_html: Version v4.45.1 published on 2025-01-12. The summary of changes are: This release adds the ability to create parent directories when using --split-exp, along with dependency updates. Thanks to @rudo-thomas for the contribution.
